segments.text: Hello everyone , and welcome to our CPR for beginners course.First of all , does anyone know what CPR stands for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s right ! We apply CPR in the case of cardiac arrest or pulmonary arrest .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , basically if your heart stops pumping blood , or your lungs stop pumping air , then we need to get them going again ! That ’ s when we have to apply this procedure . Let ’ s begin ! I need a volunteer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright , come here and lay flat on your back . Let ’ s suppose this young woman has stopped breathing . We must lift the person ’ s chin so that we clear a pathway for air to get into the lungs . Then we place our mouth over the other person ’ s mouth and blow air two or three times , like this .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wait , what are you doing ? I ’ m a married woman ! You can ’ t just try to kiss me like this !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Madam I ’ m not trying to kiss you ! I am trying to demonstrate how to apply CPR in the case of an emergency .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , OK . But no French kissing !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: As I was saying , we blow air through the mouth in this manner . Once this is done , we must try to get the heart going again . To do this , we place our hands over the person ’ s chest , and press down firmly two or three times .
